issues.title: Fails to build
issues.author: mouse07410
issues.body:

comments.author: bwesterb
comments.body:
This might be it?

`*** execution expired while fetching https://www.rfc-editor.org/refs/bibxml/reference.RFC.2119.xml`

comments.author: mouse07410
comments.body:
> This might be it?

I've no idea. 

Does this ton of stuff that the `make` gets involved, understand web proxy?

If not, may I suggest that the build process is flawed for corporate users? And, more importantly, how to fix it?

comments.author: bwesterb
comments.body:
> And, more importantly, how to fix it?

No clue. I’m new to this tooling as well, and I cannot reproduce your error myself.

comments.author: bwesterb
comments.body: Note that you can read the draft already [here](https://bwesterb.github.io/draft-schwabe-cfrg-kyber/draft-cfrg-schwabe-kyber.html) as CI builds it for us.

comments.author: mouse07410
comments.body:
> Note that you can read the draft already here as CI builds it for us.

Excellent, thanks!

I assume you tried to reproduce the error **not** from behind a firewall?

If you're new to this tooling - you probably got it from somewhere? Would it be possible to report this problem there?

comments.author: bwesterb
comments.body:
> I assume you tried to reproduce the error **not** from behind a firewall?

Exactly.

> If you're new to this tooling - you probably got it from somewhere? Would it be possible to report this problem there?

It’s [Martin’s template](https://github.com/martinthomson/internet-draft-template).

issues.title: Check if we can use unicode math symbols
issues.author: bwesterb

issues.title: Check NIST test vectors against Python specification
issues.author: bwesterb

issues.title: Use proper streaming SHAKE implementation in Python specification
issues.author: bwesterb

issues.title: Set values in YAML header properly
issues.author: bwesterb

issues.title: How much background to give?
issues.author: bwesterb
issues.body: We give background on NTT. Is this necessary? Should we give more background on why Kyber works?

issues.title: Give implementation hints
issues.author: bwesterb
issues.body: No one is going to run Kyber without at least some optimisations such as Montgomery multiplication. Should we add some suggestions/tests in the rfc?

issues.title: Figure out how to link within rfc
issues.author: bwesterb

issues.title: Add references to related work/existing standards
issues.author: bwesterb

comments.author: bwesterb
comments.body: Also mention that all these primitives are essentially the same.

issues.title: Consider other languages for machine-readable specification
issues.author: bwesterb

issues.title: Finish specification of Kyber.CPAPKE and Kyber itself
issues.author: bwesterb

issues.title: Reconsider method of defining OctetsToBits, BitsToOctets, Encode/Decode
issues.author: bwesterb
issues.body: I think we could do this with a single Rebase primitive.

issues.title: Add warnings about using Kyber.CPAPKE directly
issues.author: bwesterb

issues.title: Remove superfluous slashes
issues.author: bwesterb
issues.body: In displays we do not need to escape `_` as `\_`.

issues.title: Should we define the norm?
issues.author: bwesterb
issues.body: We don't really use the norm in describing the algorithm.

pulls.title: Fix draft so that it compiles
pulls.author: martinthomson
pulls.body:
The tool was detecting a table in a list, which isn't allowed.  Mostly
because you are using `||` operators.

This should unblock the setup process.

pulls.title: Add NIST KAT tests
pulls.author: jschanck
